directions: Place black-eyed peas in 8 quart pot.  Add enough water to fill pot 3/4 full.  Stir in ham and diced onions, and season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.  Place tomatoes in a blender or food processor, and blend until the tomatoes are liquefied.  Add tomatoes to pot.  Bring all ingredients to boil.  Cover the pot, and simmer on low heat for 2 1/2 to 3 hours, or until the peas are tender.
title: New Year's Day Black-Eyed Peas
